pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 17, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 17, 2016:

New York, New York, United States of America

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President and CEO of Thomson Reuters.

Embassy Room, 3rd floor
Westin New York Grand Central
New York City, New York

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity (cameras and photographers only)
  • Accredited media only


1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Canadian Women Business Leaders Roundtable.

Grand Central A, 3rd floor
Westin New York Grand Central
New York City, New York

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity (cameras and photographers only)
  • Accredited media only


Media appearance

9:00 a.m. ETâ€“ to air live on Bloomberg Television

The Prime Minister will participate in a Bloomberg Town Hall at the Bloomberg Headquarters in New York.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
